overview: Gender swaps. Drag. Regency era glamour with a post-modern flare. This  satirical adaptation of Jane Austen’s classic novel “Pride &  Prejudice” follows the perspective of the proud, rich, and austere  Darcy, a woman who is determined to win Lizzy Bennet’s hand despite the  objections of Darcy’s class-conscious aunt.
title: Pride & Prejudice & Gays
